definition: women's volleyball/abbr. for 女子排球

sentences.english: Hanna, female, a master graduate in vacuum and fluid engineering center.
sentences.chinese: 韓娜，女，真空與流體工程研究中心碩士研究生。

sentences.english: A gaggle of schoolgirls followed the tennis star to his car.
sentences.chinese: 一羣嘰哩呱啦的女學生跟著網球明星到他的車子。

sentences.english: The man always holds woman's hand closely to grasp.
sentences.chinese: 男亽始終抓住女亽旳掱緊緊握著。

sentences.english: National-wide, females claim 38% of the total number of cadres.
sentences.chinese: 全國女幹部的比例已佔幹部總數的38%以上。

sentences.english: Whether or not they will take a leaf out of that book is another matter.
sentences.chinese: 女人們是否能從這本書中得到教益是另外一回事。

sentences.english: This might be the reason why the Valkyries are also called the "Battle Maidens."
sentences.chinese: 這可能是女武神的原因也被稱爲“戰鬥少女。”

sentences.english: Is it impossible to find a lovely, slender female paratrooper?
sentences.chinese: 就不能找個可人又苗條的女傘兵？

sentences.english: Jack is totally in love with his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 傑克愛他的女友愛得五體投地。

sentences.english: The robber abduct the heiress and hold her to ransom.
sentences.chinese: 強盜劫持了女繼承人並向她索取贖金。

sentences.english: Zoo spokeswoman Durruty said everyone was "absolutely thrilled" at the sextuplets' birth.
sentences.chinese: 動物園女發言人杜魯蒂說大家都被六胞胎驚呆了。

sentences.english: Do you have a lesbian in your life?
sentences.chinese: 你生命中是否有女同性戀者？

sentences.english: The waitress shows you to your table and gives you each a menu.
sentences.chinese: 女侍應便帶你們到一張餐枱，並給你們每人一份菜單。

sentences.english: He Wenna, a trampoline athlete, is my favorite sportswoman.
sentences.chinese: 何雯娜，蹦牀運動員，是我最喜歡的女運動員。

sentences.english: So apparently there's this area where all like the sororities are
sentences.chinese: 所以這個區域是很多女大學生聯誼會聚集的地方。

sentences.english: Films and TV programmes are often made out of continuity.
sentences.chinese: 負責電視電影等劇情各部分安排的女場記員。

definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
(classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
one's native place/place of ancestry/registered birthplace
